nodes.text: Fuel droids, or refueling droids, were a type of droids used to refuel starship in place of an organic operator, to reduce the risk of explosion while manipulating explosive liquid metal fuel.
Theed Spaceport on Naboo was equipped with at least four building-sized refueling droids, which were painted yellow.

Fuel droids made a brief appearance in Star Wars: Episode II Attack of the Clones. They were first canonically identified as refueling droids in the 2016 reference book Star Wars: Complete Locations, an updated version of a 2005 Star Wars Legends book of the same name.
